      • createExecutionImpl

        protected Execution createExecutionImpl(WorkflowBundle workflowBundle,
                                        Workflow workflow,
                                        Profile profile,
                                        Bundle inputs)
                                 throws InvalidWorkflowException
        Description copied from class: AbstractExecutionService
        Creates an implementation of an Execution. To be implemented by concrete implementations of ExecutionService.
        Specified by:
        createExecutionImpl in class AbstractExecutionService
        Parameters:
        workflowBundle - the WorkflowBundle containing the Workflows required for execution
        workflow - the Workflow to execute
        profile - the Profile to use when executing the Workflow
        inputs - the Bundle containing the data values for the Workflow
        Returns:
        a new Execution implementation
        Throws:
        InvalidWorkflowException - if the specified workflow is invalid

        Description copied from interface: ExecutionService
        Returns the ExecutionEnvironments available for this ExecutionService.

        the ExecutionEnvironments available for this ExecutionService
